TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintTicket extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public NotInheritable Class PrintTicket Implements INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: Defines the settings of a print job.

span.span: Defines the settings of a print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象是名为 XML 文档的特定类型的简单-到-工作-具有表示*PrintTicket 文档*。A object is an easy-to-work-with representation of a certain type of XML document called a *PrintTicket document*. 后者是一组指令告知如何设置它的各种功能 （如自动分页和装订，进行双面打印） 的打印机。The latter is a set of instructions telling a printer how to set its various features (such as duplexing, collating, and stapling). 例如，若要指示要打开其装订和装订左上角中的打印作业的打印机，该文档应具有``指定的元素**StapleTopLeft**。For example, to instruct the printer to turn on its stapler and staple print jobs in the upper left corner, the document would have a `` element that specifies **StapleTopLeft**. 元素，反过来，为由属性的对象。The element is, in turn, represented by the property of the object. PrintTicket 文档必须符合[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。The PrintTicket document must conform to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397). 类使应用程序可以配置打印机的功能而无需进行任何直接编写 XML对象。The class enables your application to configure the printer's features without having to engage in any direct writing of XML objects. 所有家庭和商业文件和照片打印机的功能最受欢迎的属性由表示类。All of the most popular features of home and business file and photo printers are represented by properties of the class. 但[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)定义更多不太常见，功能和它可进行扩展以处理特殊打印设备的功能。But the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) defines many more, less common, features and it can be extended to handle features of specialty printing devices. 因此，尽管并类不能被继承，可以扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)识别并不表示中的打印设备功能或类。So, although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 有关详细信息请参阅[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 打印架构和创建新的打印系统类扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). **请注意**时选取 PrintTicket 文档的构造函数创建对象 (作为) 参数，该整个文档存储在非公共字段的对象，包括在其中的 XML 元素中的express 不太常见的功能不由任何的公共属性所表示类。**Note** When the object is created with the constructor that takes a PrintTicket document (as a ) parameter, that entire document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 事实上，如果生成 PrintTicket 文档的驱动程序正在使用的专用扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)、 的私人定义标记也存储为非公共 PrintTicket 文档的一部分。In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintTicket document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintTicket document. > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用在这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定特定打印机的功能以及如何配置打印作业，以充分利用它们。The following example shows how to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using an XML stream (that contains a PrintTicket document) that complies with the XML [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using an XML stream (that contains a PrintTicket document) that complies with the XML [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不会在流的读写位置重置回其原始位置。The constructor does not reset the read-write position of the stream back to its original position. 相应地，您应后重置它立即调用的构造函数。Accordingly, you should reset it immediately after calling the constructor. 整个 PrintTicket 文档存储在非公共字段中的对象，其中包括 express 不太常见功能不由任何的公共属性所表示的 XML 元素中其类。The entire PrintTicket document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 事实上，如果生成 PrintTicket 文档的驱动程序正在使用的专用扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)、 的私人定义标记也存储为非公共 PrintTicket 文档的一部分。In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintTicket document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintTicket document. 验证私有部分的文档，如果有的话，是不通过构造函数中，但所有**打印架构**-定义的部分进行验证，包括未由任何公共属性的部分类。The private parts of the document, if any, are not validated by the constructor, but all **Print Schema**-defined parts are validated, including the parts that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 相应地，无法引发，即使所有对应的公共属性的 XML 标记都有效。Accordingly, the could be thrown even if all of the XML markup that corresponds to the public properties is valid. 当任何一个的属性时写入到，此非公共 PrintTicket 文档也会更改。When any of the properties of the are written to, this non-public PrintTicket document is changed as well. 它是返回的此非公共 PrintTicket 文档和方法。It is this non-public PrintTicket document that is returned by the and methods.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printer collates its output.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printer collates its output.

value.span: 一个值，该值指示打印机是否逐份打印其输出。

span.span: A value indicating whether the printer collates its output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个`null`值此属性则表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，如果的值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`DocumentCollate`关键字，不`JobCollateAllDocuments`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `DocumentCollate` keyword, not the `JobCollateAllDocuments` keyword. 你可以测试使用的打印机支持的选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性时测试打印机的功能和配置打印作业来充分利用它们。The following example shows how to use this property when testing a printer's capabilities and configuring a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the number of copies for the print job.

span.span: Gets or sets the number of copies for the print job.

value.span: 一个可以为 null值，该值指定要打印的份数。

span.span: A nullable value that specifies how many copies to print.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个`null`值此属性则表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，如果的值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobCopiesAllDocuments`关键字，不`DocumentCopiesAllPages`关键字，或`PageCopies`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobCopiesAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentCopiesAllPages` keyword, or the `PageCopies` keyword. 你可以测试对打印机的最大使用属性。You can test for the printer's maximum by using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个`null`值此属性则表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，如果的值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageDeviceFontSubstitution`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageDeviceFontSubstitution` keyword. 你可以测试使用的打印机支持的选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.MemoryStream GetXmlStream() cil managed

summary.span: Returns a object that represents the property values of a as an XML stream that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

span.span: Returns a object that represents the property values of a as an XML stream that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

returns.span: A object that describes the print ticket with XML that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

span.span: A object that describes the print ticket with XML that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任何属性的是`null`，它们只是不会包含在 XML 标记中。If any properties of the are `null`, they will simply not be included in the XML markup. 如果对象使用包含未由任何表示标记元素的 PrintTicket 文档构造类的公共属性，这些元素将包含在此方法返回的 PrintTicket 文档。If the object was constructed with a PrintTicket document that contains markup elements not represented by any of the class's public properties, those elements will be included in the PrintTicket document returned by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property InputBin As Nullable(Of InputBin)
public: property Nullable<System::Printing::InputBin> InputBin { Nullable<System::Printing::InputBin> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::InputBin> value); };
member this.InputBin : Nullable<System.Printing.InputBin> with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating what input bin (paper tray) to use.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating what input bin (paper tray) to use.

value.span: 值，该值指示使用送纸器以及是否选择了手动或自动。

span.span: An value indicating what input tray is used and whether it is chosen manually or automatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个`null`值此属性则表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，如果的值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 也就是说，会有任何标记[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的功能`JobInputBin`， `DocumentInputBin`，或`PageInputBin`。That is, there will be no markup for the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s features `JobInputBin`, `DocumentInputBin`, or `PageInputBin`. 当此属性不是`null`，它将具有以下关系中定义的功能[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。When this property is not `null`, it will have the following relationships to the features defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397). - 如果 XML 形式包含`JobInputBin`，则此属性的值与相同`JobInputBin`(而不考虑是否存在也是`DocumentInputBin`或`PageInputBin`。If the XML form of the contains `JobInputBin`, then this property has the same value as `JobInputBin` (regardless of whether or not there is also `DocumentInputBin` or `PageInputBin`. 中的 XML 版本的标记)。markup in the XML version of the ). - 如果没有任何`JobInputBin`标记，但没有`DocumentInputBin`，则此属性的值与相同`DocumentInputBin`(而不考虑是否存在也是`PageInputBin`标记) 存在。If there is no `JobInputBin` markup, but there is `DocumentInputBin`, then this property has the same value as `DocumentInputBin` (regardless of whether or not there is also `PageInputBin` markup) present. - 如果存在既不是`JobInputBin`也不`DocumentInputBin`标记，但没有`PageInputBin`标记，则此属性具有相同的值作为`PageInputBin`。If there is neither `JobInputBin` nor `DocumentInputBin` markup, but there is `PageInputBin` markup, then this property has the same value as `PageInputBin`. 当此属性设置为任何值，然后匹配`JobInputBin`会将标记添加到 XML 的打印票证和任何`DocumentInputBin`和`PageInputBin`将删除已存在的标记。When this property is set to any value, then matching `JobInputBin` markup will be added to the XML print ticket and any `DocumentInputBin` and `PageInputBin` markup that is already there will be removed. 你可以测试使用的打印机支持的选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

span.span: A value that specifies whether the printer uses borderless printing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个`null`值此属性则表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，如果的值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageBorderless`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageBorderless` keyword. 你可以测试使用的打印机支持的选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

summary.span: Gets or sets the level of page resolution that the printer uses for a print job.

value.span: 一个表示的分辨率为定性值、 每英寸点数值，或两者的值。

span.span: A value that represents the resolution as a qualitative value, a dots-per-inch value, or both.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类具有可以在其中指定 X 和 Y 维度的每英寸点数的属性和属性可以为提供的分辨率的定性表达式。The class has properties in which you can specify the dots-per-inch for the X and Y dimensions and a property where you can give a qualitative expression to the resolution. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageResolution`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageResolution` keyword. 你可以测试使用的打印机支持的选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property PageScalingFactor As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> PageScalingFactor { Nullable<int> get(); void set(Nullable<int> value); };
member this.PageScalingFactor : Nullable<int> with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the percentage by which the printer enlarges or reduces the print image on a page.

span.span: Gets or sets the percentage by which the printer enlarges or reduces the print image on a page.
An value that represents a percentage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 打印机可以进行缩放的最大和最小限制。The printer can have maximum and minimum limits for scaling. 可以使用的规模限制测试。You can test for scale limits by using . 一个`null`值此属性则表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，如果的值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 这属性通常表示**规模**`ScoredProperty`的[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageScaling`关键字。This property generally represents the **Scale** `ScoredProperty` of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageScaling` keyword. 但有一些复杂问题，如下所示。But there are some complexities as follows. 读取时属性，该属性的行为，如下所示。When reading the property, the property behaves as follows. - PrintTicket XML 文档是否`PageScaling`功能设置为**CustomSquare**选项，和**CustomSquare**选项的**规模**值是正值，然后，是返回的值。If the PrintTicket XML document has the `PageScaling` feature set to the **CustomSquare** option, and the **CustomSquare** option’s **Scale** value is positive value, then that is the value that is returned. - PrintTicket XML 文档是否`PageScaling`功能设置为**自定义**选项，和**自定义**选项的**ScaleWidth**值是正值，就在那时，是返回的值。If the PrintTicket XML document has the `PageScaling` feature set to the **Custom** option, and the **Custom** option’s **ScaleWidth** value is positive value, then that is the value that is returned. - 在所有其他情况下，`null`返回。In all other cases, `null` is returned. 设置时属性，该属性的行为，如下所示。When setting the property, the property behaves as follows. - 如果设置为`null`，则`PageScaling`标记已从 PrintTicket XML 文档。If it’s set to `null`, then the `PageScaling` markup is removed from the PrintTicket XML document. - 否则为`PageScaling`PrintTicket XML 文档中的功能设置为**CustomSquare**并且**CustomSquare**选项的**规模**设置值与传递值。Otherwise, the `PageScaling` feature in the PrintTicket XML document is set to **CustomSquare** and the **CustomSquare** option’s **Scale** value is set to the passed value. (请参阅**异常**有关会发生什么情况的属性设置为小于 1 的值。)(See **Exceptions** for what happens if the property is set to a value less than 1.)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property PagesPerSheet As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> PagesPerSheet { Nullable<int> get(); void set(Nullable<int> value); };
member this.PagesPerSheet : Nullable<int> with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the number of pages that print on each printed side of a sheet of paper.

span.span: Gets or sets the number of pages that print on each printed side of a sheet of paper.

value.span: 一个可以为 null值，该值表示的每个打印的页数打印一张纸的面。

span.span: A nullable value that represents the number of pages that print on each printed side of a sheet of paper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数打印机支持仅有限的特定的可能性，例如 1、 2、 4、 6、 8 和 16 每侧的页面范围。Most printers support only a limited range of specific possibilities, such as 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, and 16 pages per side. 你可以测试使用的打印机支持的选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. 一个`null`值此属性则表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，如果的值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于**PagesPerSheet** `ScoredProperty`的[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously`关键字，不`DocumentNUp`关键字。This property corresponds to the **PagesPerSheet**`ScoredProperty` of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword. 你可以测试使用的打印机支持的选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

exception.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is less than 1.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how a printer arranges multiple pages that print on each side of a sheet of paper.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how a printer arranges multiple pages that print on each side of a sheet of paper.

value.span: 一个值，该值指示打印机如何呈现每张纸打印多页。

span.span: A value indicating how a printer presents multiple pages per sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，打印机可以呈现页中从左到右的行与行堆积上到。For example, a printer can present pages in left-to-right rows with rows stacked top-to-bottom. 一个`null`值此属性则表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，如果的值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于**PresentationDirection**的 subfeature[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously`关键字，不`DocumentNUp`关键字。This property corresponds to the **PresentationDirection** subfeature of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword. 你可以测试使用的打印机支持的选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating in qualitative terms the level of quality the printer uses to print a photograph.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating in qualitative terms the level of quality the printer uses to print a photograph.

value.span: 一个值，该值指示的照片质量级别。

span.span: A value indicating the level of photo quality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 照片打印机驱动程序将转换到特定分辨率和其他因素的定量值中此属性的定性表达式。The photographic printer driver translates the qualitative expression in this property into specific quantitative values for resolution and other factors. 一个`null`值此属性则表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，如果的值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PagePhotoPrintingIntent`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PagePhotoPrintingIntent` keyword. 你可以测试使用的打印机支持的选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SaveTo(class System.IO.Stream outStream) cil managed

span.span: The that holds the saved .

summary.span: Saves the settings to a object by using an XML format that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

span.span: Saves the settings to a object by using an XML format that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会在流的读写位置重置回其原始位置。This method does not reset the read-write position of the stream back to its original position. 应调用此方法后置它。You should reset it immediately after calling this method. 如果任何属性的是`null`，它们只是不会包含在 XML 标记中。If any properties of the are `null`, they will simply not be included in the XML markup. 如果对象使用包含未由任何表示标记元素的 PrintTicket 文档构造类的公共属性，这些元素将包含在此方法保存的 PrintTicket 文档。If the object was constructed with a PrintTicket document that contains markup elements not represented by any of the class's public properties, those elements will be included in the PrintTicket document saved by this method.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether, and where, a printer staples multiple pages.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether, and where, a printer staples multiple pages.

value.span: 一个值，该值指定打印机如何装订输出。

span.span: A value specifying how a printer staples the output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，打印机可以放置在一张纸的纸张或在左上角中的一个书钉的左边缘进行两次装订。For example, a printer can place two staples on the left edge of a sheet of paper, or one staple in the upper left corner. 一个`null`值此属性则表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，如果的值是`null`，XML 版本的(请参阅和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobStapleAllDocuments`关键字，不`DocumentStaple`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobStapleAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentStaple` keyword. 你可以测试使用的打印机支持的选项属性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性时测试打印机的功能和配置打印作业来充分利用它们。The following example shows how to use this property when testing a printer's capabilities and configuring a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]
